text:
about whether you will cope 
as a parent, or about whether 
you are ready to be a parent.
Some of these anxieties could 
be shared by your partner, 
friends or family. It is a good 
idea to talk through these 
feelings together.
Dreams
It is normal to have dreams 
about your baby. Sometimes 
your	dreams	may	reflect	
your anxieties. This is often 
because you are thinking a lot 
about your pregnancy and the 
changes that are happening 
in your body. Talk to your 
midwife if you are worried by
